data.text: @bulldogzrep Yes, we do have flights to Queenstown. You may check this link again for more information about travelling from Australia to New Zealand  https://t.co/CO2ZIG11GP - if you want to discuss this further, please send us a direct message. Thanks - Jaya
@HeathMorley Hi Heath. I would advise to confirm this directly with your local authority regarding any restrictions for land travel. Thanks - Chichi

@tomtomsydney @tomtomsydney Hi. Thanks for reaching out. I am not able to provide you a specific date when our flights for Sydney to Cairns on April 2022 will be out. I suggest keeping an eye on Jetstar website from time to time to check its availability. Thanks, Jay

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @bulldogzrep Hi there, thanks for reaching out. Yes, we currently do have an operating flight from Sydney to Auckland. For more information about travel between Australia and New Zealand kindly check it on our travel alerts page here: https://t.co/CO2ZIG11GP - Thanks - Jaya

@TheWoodfather Hi there, thanks for reaching out. I understand how important this to you. Would you mind sending us a Direct message? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Jaya
@wendyemily2 Hi Wendyemily, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@brettnorr Hi Brett, I can sense your disappointment with this. Our team is always open to new ideas and is evaluating our schedules all the time to see if we can offer this to our customers. Thanks - Norine
@rossj80 Hi @rossj80, thanks for reaching to us. We'd like to take a look into your flight information. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@jazza1983 Hi Jarrod, I'm sorry to hear you did not get the voucher for the full value of your fare. Would you mind sending us a DM? We'd love the chance to look into this further for you. Thanks - Norine
@alexday63 Hi thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@mad_82 Hi Mick, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@winnie13 Hi @winnie13. Sometimes things are out of our hands. Hopefully you’ll be on your way soon. For us to provide more options for you, please send us DM. Thank you. - Ryan.
@brodiestevens15 Thanks for reaching out to us @brodiestevens15. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.

@lazybass1973 I am sorry to that we are not able to change the outcome Julie. What I can do is create a case for your request to get a refund. A Case Manager will review your booking further and will contact you through email within 10 business day. - Ralph.

@lazybass1973 I understand why you’d prefer a cash refund rather than a voucher, Julie. Our voucher is flexible and valid until 31 December 2022 that you can use for future flight. It can be used on more than one booking provided there is credit remaining. - Ralph.
@WhiteSpear86 Hi Josh, we'd like to check this one out. Please send us a DM of your booking reference number, please? -Lee
@lazybass1973 Hi there, I understand that this may be a difficult time for you. We'd really like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message for we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@curmz26 Hi Josh, your voucher can be use on our Jetstar website only. you can also use this link https://t.co/MulpdQVvmX for reference in using your voucher. - Thanks, Ralph.
@nickq_MA Hi Nick, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help with your family's flight, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@marn_little Hi Marni, Sorry about that delay. We'd like to take another look at this can you send us a DM of you booking reference number, please? -Lee
@jazza1983 Hi Jarrod, I see how tough this situation is for you. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.
@ambermatthews_1 Hi Amber, we'd like to take another look at this. Please send us a DM of your booking refrence number, please. -Lee
@nikitarenwood Hi, @nikitarenwood. Sorry to hear that the flight was cancelled. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan

@sportsfromnqld Hi Sam. Thanks for reaching out. You may access your booking/boarding pass via manage my booking page here: https://t.co/k7Wa2fsVmk . You may chat with us via Live Messenger and quote INV585 if you need further assistance. Thanks - Jay
@NatassjaSharp Hi Natassja, There’s nothing we like more than hearing that one of our passengers has had a great flight experience. Thanks for letting us know! Cheers- Dan
@NatassjaSharp This is the kind of feedback we'd love to hear Natassja. Surely, this will make the team's day one-of-a-kind. I can't wait to tell them! -Lee
@princesslala14 Hi, @princesslala14. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan
@Tegertots Hi Tegan, we'd like to check this one for you. Please send us a DM of your booking reference number and your complete name, please. -Lee
@TasDave Hi, Dave. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message with your booking reference and name. Thanks, -Jay

@OystonMargaret Hi, Margaret. I am sorry to hear that. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. with the booking reference and passenger's name for assistance. Thanks, -Jay
@martincorben I know this might be stressful for you, Martin. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Norine
@NippycatQ Thanks Nippy, I can see your flight is all good. May I know what seems to be the problem? -Lee
@wehelpmarketing Hi there, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message for us to further assist you. Thanks - Jaya
@JessMur11353817 Hi, Jess. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Dan
@NippycatQ Hi Nippy, we'd like to take a look at this one. Please send us a Dm of your booking reference number and your complete name, please. -Lee
@gazaheart Hi, Samah. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Jay
@sidA350 Hi Siddharth, I understand that you want your voucher to be issued ASAP. However voucher process is 14 business days from the date of request. We appreciate your patience. Thanks - Leslie

data.text: @martincorben Hi Martin, I'm sorry to hear you still haven't received it. Alternatively, you can go to web check-in page to download and print a PDF boarding pass. If this is not possible, you must head to the airport to collect your boarding pass before check-in closes. Thanks - Norine
@Peterman_Jay Hey Peter, sorry to hear that! We'd be happy to help you out via DM though. Can you please send through your booking reference and full name privately? Thanks - Norine
@milla_mich Hi Milla, sorry to hear you're having trouble accessing the page. Can you please send us a DM with your booking reference and name so we can assist? Thanks - Norine

@dhiren_adatia Hi Dhiren, we're unable to discuss your mother's booking on a public forum. You can check your mother's flight status via our website (https://t.co/tXDdu1DKgq) or by sending us a DM. Thanks - Jay
@Emma20349174 Hi, Emma. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan
@74Keogh Hi, ck74. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Dan

@snapipup Hi @snapipup, thank you for contacting us. Carry-on and checked baggage are weighed separately – so if your carry-on is over the weight limit, you’ll still have to pay an excess baggage fee. Thanks - Dan
@nicwkelly Hi, Nic. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message with your booking reference and name for assistance. Thanks, -Jay

@penguinanddog Hi Patrick, sorry to hear that you're having trouble accessing the 'Manage My Booking'. We'd like to assist you with this. Please send us a DM with your booking reference. Thanks - Leslie
@Ryan_Bertus Hi Ryan, we'd really to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message since we are unable to assist further via this post. Thanks - Jaya

@Ryan_Bertus Hi Ryan, we do our best to seat families together and our staff is always on hand at the airport to assist passengers with young children to seat together. If you require assistance with your booking now, please send us a direct message.  Thanks - Jaya
@lil_zappia Sorry to hear you're having trouble accessing your booking. Please DM us with your booking reference and full name so we can assist. Thanks - Norine
@hennypenny01 Hi Henny, I'm sorry to hear you're having difficulties to access the page. Can you please send us a DM so we can assist you further with your booking. Thanks - Norine
@phillippabutt Hi Phillippa, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message for us to further assist you. Thanks - Jaya

@susan_rubans Hi Susan, We consistently monitor our staff levels at peak periods and are training new staff to cut down waiting times. Unfortunately, although we aim to answer every call promptly, delays can still occur. If you need assistance, please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Dan
@fieldo85 Hi there, thanks for reaching out. We'd like to look into this further for you. Could you please send us a direct message? Thanks - Jaya

@MichelePlayfair Hi Michele, I'm sorry to hear that you're having difficulty checking your booking through the Manage booking option. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@susan_rubans Hi, Susan. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan

@PeggyRob2323 Hi Frankie, I understand being comfortable during a flight is a must and we appreciate you flagging this with us - it’s not the standard we set for our aircraft. We've passed this onto our cleaners, so hopefully you see less mess next time you fly with us. Thanks - Norine

@Shuttlecock Hi Brad, Mask is mandatory on all flights across Australia, except where a medical exemption exists. We have escalated your concerns to management to follow up with our relevant teams to ensure team members are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks – Dan

urls.title: Travel Alerts | Jetstar
urls.description: Chat with one of our friendly Jetstar customer service

data.text: If you have any questions about your travel to or from Melbourne with us over the next seven days, you can find the latest info here https://t.co/2D8KsyvhoJ

@sammiedude88 Hi Sam, clearly this is very important to you. We’d love the chance to chat to you about this and see what we can do. Could you please DM us to assist you further with this. Thanks - Norine
@gotohellmitch Hi there, I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind sending us a DM with your full name and booking reference? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this. Thanks - Leslie

@brookiebook Hi Brooke, If there are any changes that we think may affect our customers, we will update our travel alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. You can send us a DM if you need assistance with your booking. We’d appreciate the chance to look into it further. Thanks – Norine
@aurantiacoXI Hi Kat, thanks for reaching out – could you please send us a DM with some more info so we can look into this for you? Thanks – Jay
@begginingoftime Hi @begginingoftime, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message here so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@dhiren_adatia Hi, Dhiren. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message with your name and booking reference for assistance. Thanks, -Jay
@Niiic0lee Hi Nicole, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to check this out for you, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@peacenicsta Hi @peacenicsta, we’re usually very proud of the customer service our team deliver, so we’d like to look into this further. Please give us  Direct Message (DM) if you need further assistance. – Ralph
@prafxis Hi Raf, thanks for getting back to us. We will check your booking and your options here. Please send us a DM so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@prafxis Hi, Raf, thanks for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you - please send us a DM with your booking reference and full name so we can assist. Thanks, - Jay
@GuyStayner Hi, Guy. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan
@krxxxsh1 Hi there, I'm sorry to heat about your recent experience. We’d like to look into this for you again. Please send us a direct message so we can assist further. Thanks - Jaya
@MartinShalak Hi @MartinShalak, I can tell you're disappointed. We’d like to look into this for you. So we can look into this further please send us a Direct Message (DM). - Thanks, Ralph.
@galvandanny Hi, Danny. Thank you for reaching out. We'd like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, -Jay

@Teamschuttle1 Hi Teamschuttle, I know this is something important to you and this is something that's stressful. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Norine

@peacenicsta Hi @peacenicsta, our team try to get everyone onboard as safely as possible – although it sounds like this time things didn’t go as planned. Thanks for letting us know. Please send us a Direct Message (DM) if you need further assistance. - Thanks Ralph
@aulte2578 Hi Mitchell, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@ericagoar Hi ericagoar, If there are any changes that we think may affect our customers, we will update our travel alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. If you need further assistance with your booking, you can send us a DM so we can look into this further. Thanks - Norine
@_heleali Hi Alisha, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@captainnorbert Hi @captainnorbert, no lockdown has been announced and no new border restrictions at this stage. We'll keep you updated and provide options if things don't go to plan on the day. Please send us a Direct Message (DM) if you need further assistance on your booking. - Thanks, Ralph.
@NicksLaing We appreciate your feedback Nick. Rest assured, all of this is noted and we'll be escalated to avoid same situation in the future. Thanks! - Lee
@kevicgardiner If you are following our page, just click our profile and you should be able to see the message link. Just click it for you to send us a direct message. Thanks - Dan

@kevicgardiner I'm sorry to hear about your experience with the telephone reservations team Kevic. Although we aim to answer every call promptly, delays can still occur. If you need further assistance, Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan

@nmooney91 Thanks for reaching out Nick– we’ve just tested this and it seems to be working okay. We would recommend giving it another go or alternatively, keep your eyes peeled on our socials later on today 😊 Thanks - Lee
@tomtomsydney Hi, Thomas. Thank you for reaching out. We' like to look into this for you. Please send us a Direct Message. Thanks, - Dan
@aulte2578 Thanks for getting back to us Al. The information is available here: https://t.co/ZaYExWyemM, and please scroll down to: "Update: Flights between Victoria and New Zealand". Thanks - Chichi

@aulte2578 Hi Al, I certainly understand this might be stressful for you. We are aware of the suspension and if there are any changes that we think may affect our customers, we will update our travel alerts page here - https://t.co/9NQ0MQVJYe. I hope that helps. Thanks - Norine
@kevicgardiner Hi Kevic, we’d like to look into this for you. Please send us a direct message so we can further assist you. Thanks, Jaya
@nickeee_tweets Hi Nicki, I'm sorry if it might caused you any confusion. Would you mind sending us a DM? We’d appreciate the chance to look into this further. Thanks – Norine

@NicksLaing Hi Nick, use of masks is mandatory on all flights and all airports across Australia except where a medical exemption exists. Thanks for letting us know so we can follow it up with our teams to ensure our teams are adhering to the correct requirements at all times. Thanks – Norine
@aulte2578 Hi Al, it may help to know though that we are reviewing  our network on a daily basis. You may keep an eye on our websites for updates. Thanks! -Lee
@sidA350 Thanks for taking the time to share it with us! That’s the kind of feedback we love to hear, Siddharth – and we’re sure Sarah will love to hear it too. We’ll pass it on! Thanks - Norine
@flickusdelcon Hi Matt, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you further with your query. Please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@alan__chow Hi Alan, I apologise for the delayed response. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@erangarangers Hi, I'm sorry to hear about your recent experience. You have my absolute assurance that Jetstar will not tolerate discrimination on ethnic, race or any other unlawful grounds. Thanks - Jaya

@kmmi_la Hi there,  I’m very sorry to hear about your disrupted flight. We know how inconvenient cancelled flights can be – and we try to avoid them as much as possible. We'd like to look into this for you. Would you mind sending us a DM (direct message) here with more info? Thanks - Jaya

@c_verdicchio Hi, I'm sorry to hear about your Mum’s recent experience at the airport. We’d like to help you with her booking, please contact us directly via DM with her booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@_acejimenez Hi Ace, I certainly appreciate you do not want to miss any of our sale. Just keep an eye on our website and we'll make sure that will keep our website posted the next time our airfares go on sale. Thanks! - Norine

@Ashleight1604 Hi, I'm sorry to hear about your experience on board and over the phone. We’d like to help you with your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi

@irespectonline Hi Fiona. It’s always disappointing missing out on a sale. Sale fares are limited and if the sale is popular there are several people booking at the one time, it can mean some customers miss out. You may still book the lowest flights available at the website. Thanks – Chichi
@millieevelynn Hi Millie, thanks for your tweet. We’d like to help you further with changing your booking, please contact us directly via DM with your booking reference and full name. Thanks - Chichi
@PeggyRob2323 That’s not the standard we set for our aircrafts, Mary – thanks for letting us know. We’ve passed this onto our cleaners. - Ralph
